questionTitle: Which of the following is a search service for online retailers that markets their products in their site searches with a number of navigations?
questionExplanation: As Google has built out its portfolio, it has released special versions of its products for the enterprise.

questionOption1: Google Bookmarks is a detailed 3D model of the human body
questionOption2: Google Base is an online service that lets you save your favorite sites and attach labels and comments
questionOption3: The Chromium projects include Chromium and Chromium OS
questionExplanation: Google Chrome Sync is a Google Tool that Syncs your Google Chrome bookmarks across multiple computers.

questionTitle: Which of the following can be deployed within an organization to speed up both local (Intranet) and Internet searching?
questionExplanation: The three versions of the Google Search Appliance can store an index of up to 300,000 (GB-1001), 10 million (GB-5005), or 30 million (GB-8008) documents.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the smaller version of the GSA that stores 300,000 indexed documents?
questionExplanation: Google sells its search engine customized for enterprises under the Google Site Search service banner.

questionOption1: With Google Custom Search Engine and Subscribed Links, you can create a search engine tailored to your needs
questionOption2: Google Currents is a social magazine app by Google
questionOption3: Google Correlate is a social magazine app by Google
questionExplanation: Google Correlate finds search patterns that correlate with real-world data.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a targeted ad service based on matching advertisers and their keywords to users and their search profiles?
questionExplanation: This service transformed Google from a competent search engine into an industry giant and is responsible for the majority of Googleâ€™s revenue stream.

questionTitle: Google __________ is the most widely used Web traffic analysis tool on the Internet.
questionExplanation: It is offered as a free service and has been adopted by many Web sites.

questionTitle: Which of the following system was replaced with Google Translate?
questionExplanation: Translate uses what is referred to as a corpus linguistics approach to translation.

questionTitle: Which of the following service that provides offline access to online data?
questionExplanation: Google Gears includes a database engine installed on the client that caches data and synchronizes it.

questionTitle: Which of the following is an open-source platform that has been used to create Google Wave and Google AdWords?
questionExplanation: GWT allows developers to create AJAX applications using Java or with the GWT compiler using JavaScript.
